title: The Global Warming Hoax - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/18/18
itunes:title: The Global Warming Hoax - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/18/18
description:
George Noory and climatologist Dr. Tim Ball discuss his theories that the concept of manmade global warming is actually a hoax designed to control mankind and change world history.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
